name: RegexMatch
description: Matches string values using ECMAScript Regex expressions and fill variables with results.
author: alelltech

inputs.name: sourceType
inputs.label: Type of source input
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicate type of **source input reference**, can be **File**, **Variable** or **Raw Text Expression**

inputs.name: regex
inputs.label: Regex
inputs.helpMarkDown: ECMAScript Regex expression you can build on [regex101.com](regex101.com)

inputs.name: outVarPrefix
inputs.label: Variable prefix for output variable set, like `MY_PREFIX_`*MATCH*.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable prefix for output variable set, default is `REGEX_` and available values are `REGEX_`**HAS_MATCH**, `REGEX_`**MATCH** and `REGEX_`**GROUP_0...N**.
